channel.title: How do i get automatic membership when i log in?
channel.description: i am currently using a project czar source and need to know how to get automatic membership.. i know you have to change a number or somthing liek that, please help!

item.title: How do i get automatic membership when i log in?
item.dc:creator: @Volcom_T Volcom T
item.description:
@Volcom_T wrote:

well if you want it to be so when you log in it gives
you member look up your starting item like weapon then
add this after u see this }
add this —>ismember = 0 and put a 1 in 0 that should work…
or just go to the member object and take away ismember = 1
and delete it and take away the ismember = 0 sendMessage("") that stuff take it away to
sorry if that sounds all weird and stuff…

item.title: How do i get automatic membership when i log in?
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

Greeley Estates:

From what I have been told you would go to “Player.java” and search membership = 0 and change the 0 to 1, and save…compile.

what he said lol

item.title: How do i get automatic membership when i log in?
item.dc:creator: @Greeley_Estates Greeley Estates™
item.description:
@Greeley_Estates wrote:

From what I have been told you would go to “Player.java” and search membership = 0 and change the 0 to 1, and save…compile.
